casebody.data:
Brown vs. The State of Georgia. Judgment affirmed. September 25, 1883. Blandford, Justice.

1. The evidence in this case shows the defendant guilty beyond a doubt.

2. One has the right i:i this state to carry a pistol in an open manner and fully exposed to view, but to carry such weapon (not a horseman’s pistol) concealed is a crime; nor is it any defence to an indictment for carrying a pistol so concealed, that the defendant’s life had been threatened.
